10:20- 11:00 am

The series will tell about the work of the police, Ambulance and fire service. They all do their duty, often risking their lives and getting into the most frightening and shocking situations.

The meaning of their daily work is to protect the safety of the streets and help everyone who needs it. Police, firefighters and paramedics work side by side in the harsh conditions of a big city.
